          <title>
            <string language="en">Water molecular structure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Molekulare Struktur des Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure moléculaire de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura molecular da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura molecolare dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοριακή δομή ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura molecular del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the molecular structure of water consisting of an oxygen atom and two hydrogen atoms.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die molekulare 
Struktur des Wassers bestehend aus einem Sauerstoffatom und zwei 
Wasserstoffatomen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre la structure moléculaire 
de l'eau se composant d'un atome d'oxygène et de deux atomes 
d'hydrogène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra a estrutura molecular da 
água que consiste em um átomo de oxigênio e em dois átomos do 
hidrogênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra la struttura molecolare di
acqua che consiste di un atomo di ossigeno e di due atomi 
dell'idrogeno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί τη μοριακή δομή του 
ύδατος που αποτελείται από άτομο οξυγόνου και δύο άτομα 
υδρογόνου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra la estructura molecular del 
agua que consiste en un átomo de oxígeno y dos átomos del 
hidrógeno.</string>
          </description>
